trends: There have been no other sightings in Kings Beach
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright flashing light every 45 seconds above Lake Tahoe, Ca. Lasted about 5 mins.
divs: Sighting DetailsWatching sky while smoking. Liv in Lake Tahoe and obsevered a white flashing light every 40- 50 seconds flash once. Not a jumbo jet or heli because it is at least 40,000+ in the sky, maybe even in earth space orbit. I know that airliners have to have a becon light while flying over Tahoe, but this light was stationary. I watched this for aout 5 minutes and then came inside to report this sighting. I just went out to see if it is still there and it is not. Also I see the space station from time to time pass by but this just sat there.
